name: Rolling West
description:
Listen here partner, you want to make it big out here? Well the money ain't in gold mining and city slickin' it's in trade. Get on your high horse and go on and git.

A survival game about heading west to trade! Trade ores. Shoot baddies. Make money, eat weird goop. Die! Or don't die! 

Made for Pig Squad's Summer Slow Jam 2022: Character Creator

Also made for Dog Pit's Cultivation Jam

Art by: Infinitebrians

Everything Else by: BIGHONKINBURGER
